languages.text: "Футфол стал для меня настоящей клеткой. Я не понимала, кто я и зачем нужна здесь. Путь назад в Каликсис казался еще одной ловушкой — даже если бы мне удалось найти идущий туда корабль, мой сектор, мой {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Орден{/g} — все тоже жили бы без меня десятки лет! Стоит мне вспомнить те месяцы, что я провела на Футфоле — и будто земля уходит из-под ног. Надеюсь, слух про культистов окажется правдой — мне не терпится болтером доказать, что... что... что я нужна миру и Империуму!"

traits.locale_text: "Футфол стал для меня настоящей клеткой. Я не понимала, кто я и зачем нужна здесь. Путь назад в Каликсис казался еще одной ловушкой — даже если бы мне удалось найти идущий туда корабль, мой сектор, мой {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Орден{/g} — все тоже жили бы без меня десятки лет! Стоит мне вспомнить те месяцы, что я провела на Футфоле — и будто земля уходит из-под ног. Надеюсь, слух про культистов окажется правдой — мне не терпится болтером доказать, что... что... что я нужна миру и Империуму!"

languages.text: "Footfall became my cage. I didn't know who I was or what purpose I had here. The way back to Calixis seemed like another trap — even if I were to find a ship headed there, my sector, my {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}order{/g} — they too would have lived decades without me by that point! Whenever I'm reminded of those months spent on Footfall, it feels like I'm falling into a pit. I hope the rumours of cultists turn out to be true — I can't wait to prove with my bolter that... that... that the world and the Imperium need me!"
languages.original_text: "Футфол стал для меня настоящей клеткой. Я не понимала, кто я и зачем нужна здесь. Путь назад в Каликсис казался еще одной ловушкой — даже если бы мне удалось найти идущий туда корабль, мой сектор, мой {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Орден{/g} — все тоже жили бы без меня десятки лет! traits.locale_text: "Footfall became my cage. I didn't know who I was or what purpose I had here. The way back to Calixis seemed like another trap — even if I were to find a ship headed there, my sector, my Order — they too would have lived without me for decades! Whenever I'm reminded of those months spent on Footfall, it's like I'm falling into a pit. I hope the rumors about the cultists turn out to be true — I can't wait to prove with my bolter that... that... that the world and the Imperium need me!"

"Footfall became my cage. I didn't know who I was or what purpose I had here. I hope the rumours of cultists turn out to be true — I can't wait to prove with my bolter that... that... that the world and the Imperium need me!"

languages.text: “落脚港变成了我的牢笼。我不明白我究竟是谁，也不明白我留在这里有什么意义。至于返回卡利西斯的道路，则似乎变成了另一个陷阱。就算我真的能找到飞船，回到来时的地方，我的支部、我的{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修会{/g}，他们也都在没有我的情况下生活了几十年！每当我想到在落脚港的那几个月，我都感觉像是掉进了深渊之中。我希望那些邪教徒的传言是真的，我已经迫不及待地想用爆矢枪证明……证明……这个世界与帝国都需要我！”
languages.original_text: "Footfall became my cage. I didn't know who I was or what purpose I had here. The way back to Calixis seemed like another trap — even if I were to find a ship headed there, my sector, my {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}order{/g} — they too would have lived decades without me by that point! Whenever I'm reminded of those months spent on Footfall, it feels like I'm falling into a pit. I hope the rumours of cultists turn out to be true — I can't wait to prove with my bolter that... that... that the world and the Imperium need me!"

traits.locale_text: “落脚港变成了我的牢笼。我不明白我究竟是谁，也不明白我留在这里有什么意义。至于返回卡利西斯的道路，则似乎变成了另一个陷阱。就算我真的能找到飞船，回到来时的地方，我的支部、我的{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修会{/g}，他们也都在没有我的情况下生活了几十年！每当我想到在落脚港的那几个月，我都感觉像是掉进了深渊之中。我希望那些邪教徒的传言是真的，我已经迫不及待地想用爆矢枪证明……证明……这个世界与帝国都需要我！”

languages.text: «Paso se convirtió en mi prisión. No sabía quién era ni para qué estaba aquí. Volver a Calixis me parecía otra trampa. Aunque encontrara una nave que fuera hacia allí, mi sector y mi {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}orden{/g}... ¡también habrían vivido décadas sin mí! Siempre que recuerdo los meses en Paso, siento como si cayera en una sima. Espero que los rumores de un culto sean ciertos... quiero demostrar con mi bólter que... ¡que el mundo y el Imperium me necesitan!».
languages.original_text: "Footfall became my cage. I didn't know who I was or what purpose I had here. The way back to Calixis seemed like another trap — even if I were to find a ship headed there, my sector, my {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}order{/g} — they too would have lived decades without me by that point! Whenever I'm reminded of those months spent on Footfall, it feels like I'm falling into a pit. I hope the rumours of cultists turn out to be true — I can't wait to prove with my bolter that... that... that the world and the Imperium need me!"

traits.locale_text: «Paso se convirtió en mi prisión. No sabía quién era ni para qué estaba aquí. Volver a Calixis me parecía otra trampa. Aunque encontrara una nave que fuera hacia allí, mi sector y mi {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}orden{/g}... ¡también habrían vivido décadas sin mí! Siempre que recuerdo los meses en Paso, siento como si cayera en una sima. Espero que los rumores de un culto sean ciertos... quiero demostrar con mi bólter que... ¡que el mundo y el Imperium me necesitan!».

languages.text: 「フットフォールは私の檻になった。自分が何者なのか、何の目的でここにいるのか、わからなかった。カリクシスへの帰り道はまた別の罠のように思えた。たとえそこに向かう船を見つけたとしても、私のいた宙域、私のいた{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}教団{/g}…彼らもその時点で、私なしで何十年も生きていただろう！フットフォールで過ごした数カ月を思い出すたびに、落とし穴に落ちていくような気分になる。魔女団の噂が真実だと判明することを願う…私は早く、このボルターで証明したいのだ…世界と、帝国が私を必要としていることを！」
languages.original_text: "Footfall became my cage. I didn't know who I was or what purpose I had here. The way back to Calixis seemed like another trap — even if I were to find a ship headed there, my sector, my {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}order{/g} — they too would have lived decades without me by that point! Whenever I'm reminded of those months spent on Footfall, it feels like I'm falling into a pit. I hope the rumours of cultists turn out to be true — I can't wait to prove with my bolter that... that... that the world and the Imperium need me!"

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールは私の檻になった。自分が何者なのか、何の目的でここにいるのか、わからなかった。カリクシスへの帰り道はまた別の罠のように思えた。たとえそこに向かう船を見つけたとしても、私のいた宙域、私のいた{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}教団{/g}…彼らもその時点で、私なしで何十年も生きていただろう！フットフォールで過ごした数カ月を思い出すたびに、落とし穴に落ちていくような気分になる。魔女団の噂が真実だと判明することを願う…私は早く、このボルターで証明したいのだ…世界と、帝国が私を必要としていることを！」

languages.text: "Footfall wurde zu einem Käfig für mich. Ich wusste nicht, wer ich war oder was ich hier sollte. Der Weg zurück nach Calixis schien mir eine weitere Falle zu sein – selbst wenn ich ein Schiff dorthin fände, hätte mein Sektor, mein {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Orden{/g} ebenfalls Jahrzehnte ohne mich verbracht! Immer wenn mich etwas an diese Monate auf Footfall erinnert, falle ich in ein Loch. Hoffentlich erweisen sich die Gerüchte über den Kult als wahr – ich kann es kaum erwarten, mit meinem Bolter zu beweisen, dass ... dass ... dass die Welt und das Imperium mich brauchen!"
languages.original_text: "Footfall became my cage. I didn't know who I was or what purpose I had here. The way back to Calixis seemed like another trap — even if I were to find a ship headed there, my sector, my {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}order{/g} — they too would have lived decades without me by that point! Whenever I'm reminded of those months spent on Footfall, it feels like I'm falling into a pit. I hope the rumours of cultists turn out to be true — I can't wait to prove with my bolter that... that... that the world and the Imperium need me!"

traits.locale_text: "Footfall wurde zu einem Käfig für mich. Ich wusste nicht, wer ich war oder was ich hier sollte. Der Weg zurück nach Calixis schien mir eine weitere Falle zu sein – selbst wenn ich ein Schiff dorthin fände, hätte mein Sektor, mein {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Orden{/g} ebenfalls Jahrzehnte ohne mich verbracht! Immer wenn mich etwas an diese Monate auf Footfall erinnert, falle ich in ein Loch. Hoffentlich erweisen sich die Gerüchte über den Kult als wahr – ich kann es kaum erwarten, mit meinem Bolter zu beweisen, dass ... dass ... dass die Welt und das Imperium mich brauchen!"

languages.text: « Ainsi, Castel est devenu ma cage. Je ne savais plus qui j'étais, je n'avais aucune raison d'être là. J'ai bien envisagé de retourner dans Calixis, mais je n'y voyais qu'une autre impasse. Même si je parvenais à trouver un vaisseau, mon secteur, mon {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}ordre{/g} avaient eux aussi vécu des décennies sans moi ! Chaque fois que je me remémore ces mois d'errance à Castel, j'ai l'impression de tomber dans un gouffre. J'espère que ces rumeurs sur la présence de cultistes sont fondées. J'ai hâte de prouver avec mon bolter que... que le monde et l'Imperium ont besoin de moi ! »
languages.original_text: "Footfall became my cage. I didn't know who I was or what purpose I had here. The way back to Calixis seemed like another trap — even if I were to find a ship headed there, my sector, my {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}order{/g} — they too would have lived decades without me by that point! Whenever I'm reminded of those months spent on Footfall, it feels like I'm falling into a pit. I hope the rumours of cultists turn out to be true — I can't wait to prove with my bolter that... that... that the world and the Imperium need me!"

traits.locale_text: « Ainsi, Castel est devenu ma cage. Je ne savais plus qui j'étais, je n'avais aucune raison d'être là. J'ai bien envisagé de retourner dans Calixis, mais je n'y voyais qu'une autre impasse. Même si je parvenais à trouver un vaisseau, mon secteur, mon {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}ordre{/g} avaient eux aussi vécu des décennies sans moi ! Chaque fois que je me remémore ces mois d'errance à Castel, j'ai l'impression de tomber dans un gouffre. J'espère que ces rumeurs sur la présence de cultistes sont fondées. J'ai hâte de prouver avec mon bolter que... que le monde et l'Imperium ont besoin de moi ! »

languages.text: "Binliman benim kafesimdi. Ne kim olduğumu ne de burada ne aradığımı bilmiyordum. Calixis'e geri dönmek ise bir başka kapandı. Sektörüme, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}kardeşliğime{/g} giden bir gemi bulmayı başarsam dahi on yıllardır bensiz yaşayan insanların arasına karışacaktım! Binliman'da geçirdiğim o dönemi her anımsadığımda, dipsiz bir kuyuya düşüyor gibi hissediyorum. Umarım tarikatçılara dair rivayetler doğru çıkar! Bulonatarımı alacağım... Bana ihtiyaçları olduğunu, hem İmparatorluk'a hem de dünyaya kanıtlayacağım!"
languages.original_text: "Footfall became my cage. I didn't know who I was or what purpose I had here. The way back to Calixis seemed like another trap — even if I were to find a ship headed there, my sector, my {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}order{/g} — they too would have lived decades without me by that point! Whenever I'm reminded of those months spent on Footfall, it feels like I'm falling into a pit. I hope the rumours of cultists turn out to be true — I can't wait to prove with my bolter that... that... that the world and the Imperium need me!"

traits.locale_text: "Binliman kafesim hâline geldi. Kim olduğumu da burada ne aradığımı da bilmiyordum. Calixis'e geri dönmek ise bir pusu gibi hissettiriyordu. Sektörüme, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}kardeşliğime{/g} giden bir gemi bulmayı başarsam dahi, on yıllardır bensiz yaşayan insanların arasına karışacaktım! Binliman'da geçirdiğim o dönemi her anımsadığımda dipsiz bir kuyuya düşüyor gibi hissediyorum. Umarım o tarikatçılara dair rivayetler doğru çıkar! Bulon silahımı kullanarak… Bana ihtiyaçları olduğunu, hem İmparatorluk'a hem de dünyaya kanıtlayacağım!"
